other_dictation_tools_send_your_audio_st: Other dictation tools send your audio straight to the cloud. Vocally can run entirely on your device — your words never leave your machine. Airplane mode, off the grid, wherever. It just works.

vocally_uses_ai_to_clean_up_your_transcr: Vocally uses AI to clean up your transcripts. It removes filler words, hesitations, false starts, etc. Speak naturally, Vocally will handle the rest.
